translation: Vniv zi ae kạfrv, (yʿny ae timav lukv yimav rsalt th myạnụ̄ animcz tʿlm mannh nishhi ankar kvr)

Bh chuhs nh tihnz ʿbadt kran yihnz ʿbadt tvhụ̄ kran chihv, (agr kạfr dvymyn mʿbvdn sintụ̄ Allah tʿālyā snz ʿbadt thi kran ạsụ̄, mgr shrkh san Allah tʿālyā snz ʿbadt chahnh mvulae kanhh ʿbadt, aamhi mvjvub āv mshrkn hndyn tmam mʿbvudn hndi ʿbadt nishhi ankar krnh.)
Th nah chihv tvhụ̄ tmụ̄ snz ʿbadt krn vạlụ̄ yymụ̄ snz ʿbadt bh kran chuhs. (yʿny yimn ṣfatn hndis khdae snz bh ʿbadt kran chuhs tvhụ̄ chihv nh timn ṣfatn hndis khdae snz ʿbadt krn vạlụ̄.)
Th nh chuhs bh tihnz ʿbadt krn vvl yihnz ʿbadt tohyih krmcz chahv. (yʿny yimn mʿbvdn hnz ʿbadt aamhi brvntth tohyih th tuhndyv malyv buddibabav chhe krmcz, bh chuhs nh timn hnz ʿbadt krn vvl.)
Th nh chihv tvhụ̄ tmụ̄ snz ʿbadt krn vạlụ̄ yymụ̄ snz ʿbadt bh chuhs kran.
Tuhndi khạṭr chuh tuhund dyn th myanhi khạṭr chuh myvn dyn. (yʿny dyn kis mʿāmls mnz chuhnh myvn th tuhund kanhh vatth, myạnụ̄ vath chhe alg th tuhnz chhe alg.)
